moves.1. d4 Nf6 2. Bf4 g6 3. Nf3 Bg7 4. e3 O-O: I have seen this position many times over this last year
moves.9... c5 10. Qc2 c4 11. Be2 b5 12. a4 Qa5: The knight on d2 is ready to spring into action
moves.13... Qa6 14. O-O bxa4: I think this is an error
moves.18... Nc6 19. Rc5 Rd8 20. Nh2 Bf8 21. Ng: The balck bishop is strong, removing it for the rook will give a slight adavntage
moves.21... Bxc5 22. bxc5: White has the potential of a passed pawn
moves.22... Qc7 23. Nf6+: The knight is going to be ver comfortable there
moves.23... Kg7 24. e4 a5 25. Bf3 Ne7 26. e5: White solidifies the centre, despite being an exchange up blacks bishop isn't really doing anything
moves.31. Nxa8 Rxa8 32. Rxa2: And is now two pawns to the good
moves.32... Rxa2 33. Qxa2 Bc6 34. g3 Ng8 35. K: I have a good chance of winning this if I can get to an end game
